name: A French Fries Maker Fair Food Cooking Game! FREE
name_original: A French Fries Maker Fair Food Cooking Game! FREE
description:
Who loves French Fries? Everybody!

No one can resist a crisp, golden brown, salty french fry. Now you can make your own anytime, anywhere on your iPhone or iPod.

Choose from 17 plates, baskets, fry cups or holders.
Select from an array of spuds… Slice your own potatoes or choose a bag of pre-cut fries:
Whole potatoes with skin, peeled potatoes, sweet potatoes and bags of crinkle, waffle, and ridge cut fries.

Fill the vat with oil. Slide your fries in and watch as the hot oil sizzles, bubbles and deep fries them to a golden brown. Scoop them out with a sieve and drop them onto your plate, basket, fries cup or holder.

Pick from 15 delicious toppings or dipping sauces... realistically dip and coat your fries before eating them. Refill your dipping sauce any time, with a variety of finger lickin' good flavors.

Don't have time to slice, dice or cook your fries? Then touch the "Eat Fries" button… to serve and eat your favorite french fries.

17 HD backgrounds.

Realistic, high quality graphics and sound.

Share with family and friends. Save to your photo library.
